Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_Beer: I know it's from Joja, but I can't pass up a free beer.

Entries.AcceptGift_joja_item: Ugh, take this away from me! Why would you even give me this junk?

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_Pickle: Crunchy and sweet. They aren't the best pickles I've ever had, but overall not bad. Especially considering that they came from Joja.

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_Coffee: It may taste like used motor oil, but it does perk you up in the morning.

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_BlueTea: Ooohh Blue Tea! Uh, don't tell Pierre that I accepted this.

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_Cheeze: Is that Joja Cheeze! We got some in the mail but mom wouldn't let me have it. I won't tell her you gave me some.

Entries.AcceptGift_joja_item: I don't know why everyone around here is against Joja? They make some decent stuff you know? Thanks kid.
I could destroy this right now but it'd probably make me sick. Eh, it's worth it.
I was just about to head over to Joja to pick some of this up. Thanks @!
Oh yeah! I love me some Joja snacks!

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_DriedFish: Ah I could use some of these for my next fishin' trip. Don't necessarily taste that great but they won't go bad when I'm out at sea.

Entries.AcceptGift_joja_item: Ya know Joja's been good to me. I know some people knock Joja, but I appreciate it.$h

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_Beer: Haha I love it! Nothin' like a cold Joja Beer after a hard days work.$h

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_PaleAle: That's a little fancier than I'm used to, but I won't complain.$h

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_Mead: That's a little fancier than I'm used to, but I won't complain.$h

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_Wine: That's a little fancier than I'm used to, but I won't complain.$h

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_BlueTea: Hmmm. Blue Tea? It's not as nice as green tea, but it would always keep me warm on the bus ride home. Thank you.

Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Adam.Joja_Juice: Joja says there are 100 vitamins and minerals in each one of these. I doubt it but they still are pretty good though.

Entries.AcceptGift_joja_item: Are you returning this?#$b#Oh, it's gift. Thank you.
No dear. Thank you for trying but this is going directly to the trash where it belongs.
